website_summaries.verdict: Proper wiring can be an issue, but this is an affordable addition to an existing audio system.
pros: Includes two subwoofers and an amp enclosed in 0.625-inch MDF
cons: Amp may overheat with max loads

customer_reviews.title: Get this speaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know anything about speakers in the slightest. I had someone professionally install this unit along with a radio I purchased online. These speakers have lasted me quite a while and still have amazing sound. It’s durable and has survived things banging around my trunk (that doesn’t mean they’re unbreakable, use caution). I look forward to driving my car because I can’t wait to try out new songs and feel the incredible base.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel Burnell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the money
customer_reviews.text: My first speakers I ever purchased, knowing nothin about speakers and wanting some serious base at a low price. And they delivered! I may not know much about speakers, but I think these are fantastic! I bought them for my 2007 Subaru Outback, which was quite the upgrade. I've had them for nearly 4 years now, unfortunately the speaker fronts have been cracked by skis and such however, they still work like new. I've had to reconnect several different wires nearly 10 times over the years, but only due to carelessness tossing skis and other things into the back, and possibly due to a cheap wiring kit I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great improvement to the anemic base sound system in my 2017 Audi A4.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this 8" powered subwoofer tube (RT8PT) in my Audi A4 last week and the improvement in the sound system is substantial. This unit fills out the low end so that I can hear kick drums, bass instruments (string bass, electric bass guitar, etc.). I have not yet used the nylon straps and don't know if I will actually need to. I am considering adding a speaker grill for protection but have not yet decided which one to buy (or how to fasten it).
customer_reviews.author: Pickngrin

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: The amp is a piece of junk when I was going to turn amp up I realized it was broken on the inside of the amp barely hanging on to the amp and immiediatly fell off when i when to put it back in its box to return... None of This is mtx quality Moro’s it mtx . the subs on the other hand are good however i do think they need to be in a bigger box, i really could not tell yea because there is nothing identifying what they are on the back of the subwoofers. Cheap china made stuff might as well order off of wish !!!!
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: for your mid size vehicle this is "great" bigger vehicle add a bigger amp and maybe a crossover perhaps....to factory just ask
customer_reviews.text: it still works after all this time even throughout the winter amp gets cold and warms up and kicks !@#$$ for yr mid size vehicle did upgrades on the wiring kit used thicker patch cords no humming what so ever I've installed to factory six disc changer radio by Toyota for Avalon with an speaker adaptor to amp still going like energizer its been i think four or five years WOW
customer_reviews.author: 9ine

customer_reviews.title: Insane bass! great cheap subwoofers. get the vented/ported ones
customer_reviews.text: These subwoofers are really good. cheap. and produce plenty of bass! Just make sure to choose the vented/ported ones if you can afford the extra bit of cash. Totally worth it. the bass is amazing. They hit hard even down to 20hz and even 15 to 18hz! Sounds like an earthquake! You dont need much power to run these loud either! 200 watts RMS is plenty for the vented/ported model! I'm only running at 50 watts RMS! They flex quite a bit at 20hz and below!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Newman

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Installed behind my backseat in the Jeep and when tuned properly you can feel the air move in the front seats. Good bump on my back when playing metal or country, not an issue at all. Doesn't rattle the car next to you, but it's perfect when you want to keep a low profile.....especially with no top on! Recommend for Jeep owners!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Thompson

customer_reviews.title: So good I have purchased 3 times for vehicles  Superb Box
customer_reviews.text: My buddy went to a local install shop. Got one little sub and paid $1300 for the sub with expensive install. Sounds horrible and had to take it back to the shop. I bought this package with the BOSS Amp. Went to Best Buy and got my H3 Rocking!!!!!! LOVE THESE SUBS. Amp was not top of the line but the BOSS pushed the subs just fine. Also put the same set up in my son's Infiniti. Then one more time for my Mustang with a pioneer Amp. You simply can't beat these quality amps. The Mustang was put in 8 years ago and they still sound great. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: Happy I made the purchase. I'm old too!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these things have a ton of bang for your buck. My buddy who is into car audio was impressed by this package. I took the time to tune this with a multimeter and a tone downloaded from mtx. Make sure to do this step!! I did the move the dial around until it doesn't clip thing just to mess around and the speakers sounded okay. After I tuned them with the multimeter and made slight adjustment via the remote these speakers slam! I think people that end up with flickering head lights on a bass hit may have the gain turned up way too much. They are perfect for my setup and needs.
customer_reviews.author: Samsquanch

customer_reviews.title: Blown in Two Months
customer_reviews.text: Great product, clean sound, for the two months it lasted. The sealed dual 12” subwoofer enclosure had a single subwoofer blow with no warning. I heard no clipping nor distortion until it was too late. The driver is no longer able to move the cone. Notes: - I suspect 250W RMS is optimal for extended use. - The subwoofers share the same airspace. - The wiring appears to be 14AWG stranded CCA. Overall, I enjoyed the product. (You get what you pay for.)
customer_reviews.author: Zabsolvo

customer_reviews.title: Da bass, I feel it.
customer_reviews.text: The last time I had a subwoofer in a car was 1995. It was something called a Boom Cannon. This is no boom cannon. its a full fledge sub with amplifier. I installed this in my 2003 Mercedes C230 Kompressor. While it takes up 1/3 of my trunk its worth the sound quality improvement. Installations was more or less straightforward. I did have to purchase a separate Subwoofer wiring kit and wire crimpers but it was worth it. Great price and great sounds.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hoven

customer_reviews.title: Voice coils failed in first week of use
customer_reviews.text: Broke in the subs, didn't push them, voice coils failed and subs quit. Box is nice, will be replacing the drivers with better quality units.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory C. Winger

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Big-Bass Producing Fun!
customer_reviews.text: A great value for some big bass (entry level fun). I matched it to this amp: Rockford Fosgate R250X1 Prime 1-Channel Mono Block Amplifier ($99 as of 1/3/20). It powers it surprisingly well without worrying about blowing the woofer. The car Headlights barely dim on the hard hits, but has enough power to send out enough bass to rattle the wall clock inside my house. For a very affordable setup, get this box and trusty amp! Get 4 gauge power cable kit and a tool to remove your panel without destroying the plastic screw thingys.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Years of Performance
customer_reviews.text: I have had these Subs in 2 different cars for the past 4 years. They have been great for people like me who enjoy bass that is just right. Paired with even the cheapest amp the subs deliver solid bass without drowning out the vocals. With a decent amp they can be as loud and crisp as almost anyone would want. These subs have outlasted the wiring kits and head units that I have had. They are also pretty rugged seeing as they have been in the back of my Jeep for the last 3 years and have taken a fair bit of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading the reviews and buy it already.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Although I will say that it doesn't come with any sort of external bass controller, so that being said if you run an LOC most of the gain will go by your bass setting on your stereo that is intended for speakers. If you install a new deck with RCA outputs you wont have a problem, if you run factory stereo, then buy the external bass controller from the actual MTX website.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Gildersleeve

customer_reviews.title: TRASH!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are good for probably a month or two tops. Ive bought both the sealed and ported version and they both failed within a month or two. Their rated power is fake. I have a Kenwood KAC-9106D 2000W Monoblock Class D Car Audio Power Amplifier rated at 1000 watts rms at 2 olms. The same rating these speakers claim they can handle "plus more". Don't waste your time with these. Save your money and buy yourself something else and before i forget Amazon will not except returns for these speakers. STAY AWAY!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great budget/intro buy
customer_reviews.text: Value-wise this is an amazing buy. Since its a bundle of 2 12s, amp, and box already put together its very easy to install. This a great buy for the person just getting into car audio and wants a little bass in there music without breaking the bank. Also a great gift for anyone who loves music and is lacking any aftermarket sound equipment in their car. I never had any problems with the amplifier or subwoofers besides the amp getting a little hot. In extreme cases i think it did overheat and turn off to protect itself maybe once or twice.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this and have been enjoying it for about two days now. I installed it in a extended cab Ford Ranger and it sound just right! It produces nice, tight bass (as advertised) and was VERY easy to install, once you run the wires which wasn’t that hard for my vehicle. It has several installation options depending on individual needs. For the price, you can’t beat it. Would highly recommend if you are on a budget, want a solid sub to seriously enhance the bass in your car, but also don’t want to shake your car apart or need you eardrums annihilated to enjoy your tunes while driving from point A to point B.
customer_reviews.author: David L Watts

customer_reviews.title: ... this about 5 years ago and it was a great buy good bass and really good sound for what ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 5 years ago and it was a great buy good bass and really good sound for what I was wanting since I’m not trying to win any competitions and I like to actually understand the words on my stock stereo and speakers. I remember a few people commenting when I bought that the amp would overheat so I ended up installing mine under the driver seat so I could turn the feet a/c if there was ever any overheating to cool it down but really I only ever had it overheat on me like twice but I was driving around for about two hours
customer_reviews.author: Mike91

customer_reviews.title: MEH!!
customer_reviews.text: I understand that this is a budget set up. But in my opinion these speakers are muffled even at low volume. Thought they could possibly get better over time... nope. They are ok if you don't like any kind of pounding. But if you like to put your volume past 10 then spend a little extra money
customer_reviews.author: Edward Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I GOT ROBBED
customer_reviews.text: THE PRODUCT DIDN'T WORK. IT FIRED UP BUT NO SOUND. I WAS HEART BROKEN BECAUSE I BOUGHT IT ON SALE DURING THE PANDEMIC BUT COULDN'T INSTALL IT BECAUSE OF THE LOCKDOWN IN MY CITY. WHEN I FINALLY GOT TO INSTALL IT AFTER THE LOCKDOWN WAS LIFTED. IT DIDN'T WORK AND MY WARRANTY WAS EXPIRED AND I COULDN'T SEND IT BACK TO AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN PARKER

customer_reviews.title: had them professionally installed and they worked and sounded great crazy bass makes trunk shake
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten these speakers twice first time came out of the box defective, amazon understood and gave me a refund. So I repurchased, had them professionally installed and they worked and sounded great crazy bass makes trunk shake. But then after having for about a week and nevr even putting the volume half up on them they gave out and stopped working. Greatly amazon issued another refund so I am going to give them one more try hopefully third time is a charm, because when they work they are great but so farm have been a pain in my a**.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi W.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Although this may look like a great product its a complete hassle and so far not even close to worth it. I installed these into my 2016 Camaro only to find after paying to have them installed and waiting for all packaging to ship in that the AMP doesn't even turn on, completely defective. So now not only did I waste my money on buying this piece of junk I now wasted another 150$ for installing it into my car. Thanks a lot MTX.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation good looks perfect fit and still room in the trunk of my 2010 Nissan Altima
customer_reviews.author: David Arciga

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wire and amp
customer_reviews.text: I bought these less than 7 months ago for my sons Christmas. We paid to have them professionally installed by a reputable audio specialist business in town. Today his radio wasn't working. So we take it back to the installer who showed us the problem. He said "the amp went bad and burnt up the cheap wire." So at this point I would not recommend to purchase. 7 months is no time for a $400 purchase and a disappointed kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a win
customer_reviews.text: I recently blew my 10inch kickers I had hooked up to a mtx thunder 300xd, so I bought these lil jammies and just plugged them straight in using the same wiring and they are extremely loud not even pushing the full 300 watts on my amp. I would recommend if your not looking to break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob

customer_reviews.title: Need New Subwoofers from 1 Year Manufactures Warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I received these subwoofers July 30 2018, both speakers blew today, August 13 2018. I ran these subwoofers on a Alpine 500w Monoblock amplifier with 8 gauge wiring so it’s not like I was running major power on the subwoofers, 250 Watts to each subwoofer. I’ve had MTX Terminators before being pushed by 750 and 1000 watt amplifiers without any problems for over a year but these only lasted 2 Weeks exactly from first setup.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: this thing bumps
customer_reviews.text: my whole car shakes, and thats with the bass knob on low. I paired this with the Rockford mono D amp for my Subaru 2007 outback. I did so much research before I bought this subwoofer, and I feel like its definitely worth the money it costs. Its much cheaper than buying a sub and the box separately. Its way bigger than I expected, but it still fits in my car's hatchback. I highly recommend getting a good amp to pair with it! I had it professionally installed at a car shop, which costed about an extra $350. I recommend getting it installed professionally unless you are highly experienced with car electrical work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: placement is important
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine getting much more bass in this size at this price point. placement is very important so leave a little slack in your wires to move it around. I found that putting the speaker cone against the back seat produced the best sound. the remote knob is essential for me, because there's not a lot of headroom and needs to be adjusted often depending on the type of music.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive bass , but ....
customer_reviews.text: This has very impressive bass response in a small package. But it is not plug 'n play if your adding it to a stock head unit. You will need a good high quality 'line-out' converter : for this to really perform it's best.
customer_reviews.author: One

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my cart and was recommended a Boss 1100 watt amp so I grabbed it and the wiring kit. Hooked it all up and BOOM!! this combo works very good for all in $200. Highly recommended for someone who just wants their car to sound good with a good amount of bass. I've had Fosgate, Kicker, JL and many others that "Hit Harder" but I was just looking for a good bass sound to add to my stock radio and speakers. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Casteel

customer_reviews.title: Dude..
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, Do it. Personally I run Sundown Audio 12' in my car. I don't compromise But I got these for a buddy and they actually are really great. Very clear, good punch. And the PRICE. Again, I personally dont compromise. However, if you just want a nice system with low cost. Do it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy T

customer_reviews.title: Good set of subs
customer_reviews.text: Good set of subs. They not gonna be the loudest on the block but you will definitely know they are back there. Coupled with a Kenwood kac5001 they knock enough to make ya happy. I play these speakers full blast the entire way to and from work 30 min each way and no issues in the almost year I have had em. Of course if you don't know how to install subs get someone to do it for ya.
customer_reviews.author: raleigh spartan

customer_reviews.title: MTX is best
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time having MTX subs and still love them, my last set up was almost as old as me and still worked great when I sold them. I can say the same for these. Sound quality is great and if you know what you're doing, super easy to install. Not to mention they're affordable compared to other top brands. Bang for your buck for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great starter or budget.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in 1996 f150 single cab with boss audio amp install kit. For the price you can't beat it. No problems. Looks and sounds great! I've had kicker and other high end brands. Not saying as good as kicker but again for the price you can't beat it. Quality subs, box and amp.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your small bucks
customer_reviews.text: What can u say really? Great setup for a noob. Had it installed professionally and wasn’t expecting much. The bass dang near took my breath away ( literally) was not expecting the big booms and my bass knob is at minimum. Partied it with a pioneer mono block amp ( GM-D9701 ). Will be upgrading next year but for now my wife greets me with a welcome home text before I’m in the house she can hear me come up the street lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kayden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound. Pour packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked and sounded great. Easy to hook up and super affordable only reason for the 5 star. Only thing bad was when I received it is that the box was beat to hell but seemed alright when looking over it, and luckily everything seemed still intact when I opened the packaging. There was screws and random cardboard everywhere when i looked inside the box like it was messed with before I got it, but I kept it only because it all still worked and nothing was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky & Germany

customer_reviews.title: Box is good but the amp is not built to last!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but could use a little more punch. It's close but just a little more would better! Update- the built in amp on the box just gave up in under 6 months! This is not even in my daily driver. So I would say the amp lasted less than 2 months before it quit working!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t take power at all
customer_reviews.text: They are subs, but they really get overloaded really easily. They would distort with 250 watts going through them... The amp was tuned, they were in the box, my head unit had factory settings (no bass or mega bass turned on). I don’t like them that good, but it’s a good starter setup, maybe I got a defective unit, I have no idea but I wouldn’t buy these, save up 300 more dollars and get some good ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Booming right out the box!
customer_reviews.text: Got these in about a week after ordering them, i live in Hawaii and as a Prime member shipping was free and fast, got these hooked up to a Boss Mono block amp 1100watts and a Boss 18 farad Capacitor and they slam in my Kia Optima Hybrid..Im old School so MTX reminds me of the good ol days..Buy them you won't regret it..Aloha!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Shane

customer_reviews.title: Nice combo
customer_reviews.text: This sub and amp combo is a steal of a deal for a easy small set up. It’s not competition like bass but this combo push for a daily driven set up in a car. I’ll recommend anyone whose on a budget and just starting to get this. I’ll update this after 1 month of use
customer_reviews.author: DeQuan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level sound system.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit with everything you need to get started at an amazing price. Don’t expect to shake the earth but for the cost, it was a great little gift. The amp and subs are a little under powered if you’re looking for serious bass but any more than this is just overkill. The box is extremely well made and the subs come already secured in the box. Overall great buy.
customer_reviews.author: magnus

customer_reviews.title: Get the protection plan it will save you from halsel and wasting your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not put on amp over 4500 wats Are used for about three days and then they just froze or at least that’s what the guy at the shop told me I really feel like I wasted my money but hey At the end of the day is still materialistic I just hate that I wasted my money Wish I could get refund I know for sure next time I am getting the protection plan no doubt
customer_reviews.author: Quincy Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Not loud. Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Did not sound as loud as I expected them. I have a 10 inch kicker in a ported box and that’s wayyyy louder and better quality than these. I actually bought these to upgrade from the 10 to two 12 but as it turns out it was a downgrade... extremely dissatisfied. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo O.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the price!! They hit hard!!!! Mtx fan for life now...
customer_reviews.text: There are a million review on these subs so I will keep it short. Do not get the sub package with the boss 1100 boss amp. It will still bump with that but it's underpowered. Get the next step up with the 1600 watt mono riot BOSS. You can find for 60$ used on amazon. It will power them much closers to their respective rms at 400. For budget people who are poor or don't wanna spend 500 or more on their system these subs slam!! They are phenomenal so far in my jeep liberty. Can't wait to break them in and then see what they can do. 5 stars!! I will update in 1 week, and 3-6months from now.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Intense bass for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a beefy setup but I went for something affordable and longevity. I have these paired with the MTX Thunder500.1 amp and they sound great. I used a multimeter to set my amp to 32v (V=square root of rms x ohms) They sound great to me and give me enough bump for what I was hoping to get for the price I paid. The overall box is a bit heavier than I expected but that just means it's noting to to move anywhere. I have a 99 civic ex and it fit in the trunk just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marty.Vargo

customer_reviews.title: TRASH
customer_reviews.text: I had this professionally installed only to find out that I received a defective amp! Item is unreasonable! There is NO WAY to contact the seller either! Amazon won't help me. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound..Hits hard!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great,hits extremely hard,dis not used supplied amp bought a Boss 1100 watt amp on Amazon,not a huge fan of MTX but for the price these will definitely make ur car rattle and turn some heads. Box is kinda big so make sure that it will fit in ur trunk,I had to go through the back seats
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Barton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck, 4 door sedan, truck or hatchback, this thing kicks, i recommend anyone to buy this if u are new to speakers or experienced. to get the full use of these speakers, i would put aftermarket speakers/tweeters in your car as well as a new stereo system if ur car is older. it will sound a whole lot better with everything than just changing thesub of ur car.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander G

customer_reviews.title: They’re okay, good value for price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed because my 10 year old single 12” pyle sub and low tier 500w amp put out more bass than these, but I’ll give it some time because they may need to be broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very good for starting out. Actually pretty decent!
customer_reviews.text: The prices is unbeatable honestly I order this for my husband, he wanted these for the mean time while he saved up enough to buy the high quality couple grand ones $.. but this was just fine, nice bass even sound throughout and a very good start for the money. (Also this fits in a 2012 chevy cruise)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney clayter

customer_reviews.title: Great box and sub woofers for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great box and sub woofers for the money. After reading about 2,000 reviews I decided to buy the Rockford Fosgate R500X1D Prime 1-Channel Class D Amplifier. I couldn't be happier with my decision. This little amp puts out more than enough power for these giant subs. You do not need to use a capacitor for this set-up either. Sub woofers sounds excellent with this amp and the amp stays very cool all day. I hooked this system hooked up in my explorer and was very fast and easy. Just buy a wiring kit, these subs, and amp listed above and you'll be ready to pound all day and night.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee pro

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased these to install as a surprise 16th birthday present to our nephew. They sound really good. They were quick and easy to hook up. Our nephew was very impressed with them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I have these in my 89 bronco. Pieces of crap. Didn't even last a month of me babying them. I have it hooked up with all MTX stereo equipment other than my deck. Definitely wouldn't recommend you buy these. Going to try some fosgate subs or kicker.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this purchase. The performance you get for the priced is simply unmatched. Coupled this with a 1200 Watt Kicker Mono amp and I'm blown away. This sounded a thousand times better than I expected. Clean, deep, hard hitting Bass. If you're on the fence fear not, greatness awaits, what are you waiting for, you won't find a better deal than this.
customer_reviews.author: Corwin Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: cant say enough good things about speaker
customer_reviews.text: cant say enough good things about speaker, only thing is I should have bought the amp speaker combo to save a few dollors but. paired with Rockford fosgate 500xd and sounds amazing.....
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Installation is easiest if you have an after market head unit.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Sounds better than expected. My stock woofer was ok but this is just right for my truck.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: These subs hit hard for the price. I ordered the ported enclosure, i previously owned the sealed enclosure in my previous car and the ported enclosure has a noticeable bass difference obviously since it's ported, paired with a planet audio 1200w 2 channel amp around 50 bucks on Amazon, this is the perfect starter setup and has my car seats turned into massage chairs, and the subs can be pushed to 2000w peak, 1000w rms in case those wondering! 5/5 stars! Ive owned these subs for 5 months as of writing this review and these are the best bang for your buck period! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Good balance between price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Hits very hard with an adequate amp. Might be slightly more sloppy than responsive. I'm still tweaking all the adjustments between head unit, amp, and amp remote. Not too crazy outside vehicle, but inside it Knocks
customer_reviews.author: bigdogjrock

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a 2016 Dodge Charger and I have to say, it sounds amazing. I was iffy on getting it at first but after doing some research I finally ended up ordering them and they did not dissapoint...
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very very good subs for the price. The amp is only 250 watts in the kit but bro it hits hard even only with 250. Pretty good as like a starter kit easy to upgrade but they hit hard for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JustinBeBustin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be shy, these subs kick like a donkey to your chest!
customer_reviews.text: Having had a very bad experience recently on an amplified sub box with built in everything from pioneer, I decided to take a shot on the MTX subs and adding a separate amp. Using a mono block Planet Audio at 2 ohms these things POUND! Very clear bass, very clean sound. I have always been a Rockford guy and I remember using MTX back in high school in the late 80s and they were decent. But man these really changed my mind. Great job MTX for allowing $150 to shake my hair and tickle my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Pannell

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great
customer_reviews.text: So far I've had this installed for about a montha a half and it was more than I expected in a good way !! Definitely reccomend to anyone I installed in a 2020 kia forte
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: They sound great
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound really good. Crisp and loud. I replaced a JL Audio W6 with these and they are way better at a fraction of the price. I have them powered by a JL Audio 600/1
customer_reviews.author: Joe santoli

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I have installed these kits in 3 different vehicles now and always impressed by how good they sound for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Stole my money and almost set my car on fire!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap!!! Do not buy. I bought these speakers and set an appointment to get them installed weeks later by a professional company. The speakers stop working after day one and the seller did nothing to fix the issue!!!!! They stole my money !!!!!! Do not waste your time or money with this company. Update, these speakers were smoking and about to set my car on fire. This company Is selling damage speakers
customer_reviews.author: Albony

customer_reviews.title: RMS rating is not nearly what it says
customer_reviews.text: Going into it we took a sub out to look and wasn’t too impressed. I ran this at 600 rms at 2 ohms and cooked the voice coils very fast and ruined the speakers. Great box though, will put new speakers in the same box.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Find another sub
customer_reviews.text: Do not use an amp higher than 500 watts or you'll blow it.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Remember,They are cheap. But you cant complain.They are powerful for what they are,Cheap entry level subs. But they are the best
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these in the back of my Explorer. Very budget build. For the price that I paid these things are Awesome. I did have one blow under some decent hard use but was able to get it replaced and have not had an issue yet. They are great for what they are but dont expect Hair tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Shelbi

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a sub and amp deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Man this thang bumps. Legit cant think of a better combo deal with this good sound quality. I installed myself and have an EQualizer so that made it sound that much better. Directions could have been better if this is your first install but youll figure it out. If you dne one they all relatively same.
customer_reviews.author: Kris S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Have a 1500 watt mono amp on it and it has everything in my car vibrating and rattling.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a COMPLETE waste of money. 12's were not no where near the stated RMS power and the box is very cheaply made with no divider between the speakers SMH... Amazon didn't even want the speakers back, just gave me a refund and said to do what I wanted with the product! Waste of time and money! Can't believe MTX has came to this...

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!!! Don’t waist your time. Box they came in was damaged, speaker was damaged and the amp out of the box didn’t work. Don’t waist your time... cheap,cheap,cheap. Amazon customer service very good...

customer_reviews.title: They blow fast
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are garbage they sound good when you first hook them up but blow really fast I do not recommend these speakers to no one

customer_reviews.title: First subs, sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. I'm powering it with a Boss AR1500M Armor with no issues. If I want, it can be bad and bougie enough to prohibit me from seeing out my rearview mirror from it vibrating so I can't complain. Update: after a year, they're still sounding great

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good but could be a little better for the price but overall I'm happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Way to go MTX
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this subwoofer easy to install. And sounds great 👍👍👍👍 👍

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best for the money match with cheap amp and break them in low music

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and well worth the pay out, shipped in a very secure box, sound is incredible! I would recommend anyone to this product! Great for speaker lovers like myself.
customer_reviews.author: CASHxFORxFREE

customer_reviews.title: Repaired myself
customer_reviews.text: Received defective. No option online to return or replaced. Repaired and reinstalled. Working but for how long.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on legendary Sub speakers
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been an MTX fan since the 90’s and this recent purchase didn’t disappoint. I didn’t go with an MTX amp, and I’m still dialing in the crossover but love how clean these hit. Fits great in a 2019 Chrysler 300s. Battery in the back makes the install super easy. The port is to the left but on phase 0 you can feel them hit.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners or a simple set up
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a guy with 2 15s on an 8000w system... these bang for what they are. I got them because I didn’t want a crazy set up in my beater, but they sound much better than I expected. Only thing that you might want to change is to add a port or a slightly higher wattage amp, but that’s for people who are serious about their sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s face it, it doesn’t cost a lot and it’s a lot of bump for the money. Everything showed up nicely packaged and sounds pretty decent. I think the subs could handle a bigger amp, but for the money, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Super clean sound.
customer_reviews.text: It takes up a lot of space, but i put it in the back of my girls mini cooper and it sounds super clean and melts your face. Easy to unplug and take out if you need the space for something else.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these alot. Or I did until they died and killed my amp with it less than 6 months after I bought them.

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: These are very heavy, the sound isn't great but it is good enough for now. They are well made though.

customer_reviews.title: It sets off car alarms as you go by
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it since March 24th but I ain't had no problems with it at all. And this speaker rocks, I can set off car alarms as I go by them on the street! is that loud enough or what. MTX has been around for a long time, they know what they're doing. this is a good speaker man

customer_reviews.text: Took it in, said I would have to bring in a new one in or take it to be fixed... no clue why or how yet, but the subs are fine with another amp. This item also isn’t returnable... so I wouldn’t recommend at all

customer_reviews.title: Sound good and surprisingly loud
customer_reviews.text: It’s been years since I’ve had subs so these were surprisingly loud for the price

customer_reviews.text: Subs sound great. Planet audio amp not so. But for the price not bad

customer_reviews.text: One speaker failed after about a week. Now they are useless. Went back with my old kicker 10s.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift, the person it was purchased for was very pleased with it and has no complaints. Thank's!

customer_reviews.title: Beginner sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Subs produce very low quality bass cheap beginners set if you want plenty of bass look elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Has good bass and comes with knob to control bass. These babies bang
customer_reviews.author: James Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: IT RATTLES MY LICENSE PLATE, AND MY REARVEIW MIRROR FELL OFF
customer_reviews.text: This is the first sub that I have ever gotten, I did a lot of research on this sub before purchasing, and it was a great deal! I received this sub last night, and plugged in the speaker wire to my boss amp, which other reviews say is a bad amp and underpowers the sub, but it’s perfect for it. It creates a loud bass when tuned correctly. A huge bang for your buck, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: They bump great.
customer_reviews.text: Especially for the price. You can't do better for the price. They are bridged or paralleled together so you only need a monochannel amp.
customer_reviews.author: Coolest Cutter At Camp

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bass for what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Was really surprised at how much sound came out this package. Well worth the price. A lot of bass for under 400 dollars. You might not win a sound competition but it will shake the rear view and side mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I push 1200 watts into it listening to Madonna's Into the Groove or Dua Lipa's Hotter Than Hell or Iggy's Fancy and it just pumps the bass so deep and clear (ridiculously heavy - clear bass response with these songs). Rear View mirror is a rocking. I push it hard with songs that have snappy hard hitting base. Using it in Honda CRV with Pioneer AVH-X8850BT deck and Pioneer GM-D9604 Amp.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: MTX Magnum MB210SP Dual 10" Enclosure/Amp Combo
product_meta.description:
Style:Dual 10" Subwoofer Enclosure + Amplifier| Pattern Name:Subwoofer

MB210SP Amp and EnclosureView larger MB210SP Enclosure SIMPLE AND EASY BASS
The Magnum MB210SP is a simple and easy way to add bass to any vehicle system. This amplifier and enclosure package from the makers of MTX Audio is designed to offer excellent price and performance so that anyone can add bass to their music.

ENGINEERED FOR BASS
The MB210SP enclosure is a dual 10" vented enclosure that is capable of handling up to 400 watts RMS power. The subwoofers themselves utilize a lightweight polypropylene dustcap and a large rubber surround to generate excellent SPL on any power. The large port on the front of the enclosure adds additional SPL especially when listening to music like Rap or Hip-Hop where a deeper more resonating bass sound is preferred. The enclosure is constructed using 5/8" MDF (medium density fiberboard) which means it is designed to handle excessive bass with no fear of failure.

POWER INCLUDED
One of the best things about the MB210SP is that it includes an amplifier that is designed specifically for the enclosure. Two advantages, you don't need to worry about finding an amplifier to use with it and you don't have to worry about over or under driving the subwoofers because the amplifier is made specifically for it. All you need is some speaker wire and an amp kit and you are ready to go.


KEY FEATURES
 * Dual 10" Vented Enclosure
 * 1200W Max Power, 800W Peak Power, 400W RMS Power
 * Included Amplifier
 * Embroidered Magnum Logo
 * Large Rubber Subwoofer Surrounds
 * Tuned for High Output
